title: Anyone want my account?
body: Finally decided to quit the game, I have skins and champs etc 3 year old account

replies.body:
You can't give away accounts, any attempt to do so will leave the account suspended. 

> D. Account Sales. The Account supplied to you is personal to you, and Riot Games does not recognize and expressly forbids the transfer of user Accounts. You shall not purchase, sell, gift or trade any Account, or make any such offer, and any attempt shall be null and void. Any distribution by you of your Account and/or your Login Credentials (except as expressly provided herein or otherwise explicitly approved of by Riot Games) may result in suspension or termination of your Account.

[Source](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse)

Just leave in peace, keep your account incase you randomly feel the urge to start playing again ♥

I've had an off on relationship due to friends playing the game. So no matter how unfun I find the game (personal opinion) I always get hooked back by having nothing else to play or addiction I guess; and I've gotten my account suspended for 3 months at a time twice (requested suspension) but that has never worked, so I took the next step :/

If you just want to remove the temptation of playing, then there's no need to sell your account. You can send in a support ticket instead to delete your account (permanent), or deactivate it (provisional). 

Instructions on how to do this can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ).
no, no one would want your account
